title: Pokemon Snap Returns! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.17.20
description:
Hell has frozen over, and Gary Whitta and Greg have thoughts! 

Time Stamps - 
 00:00:00 - Start
00:04:00 - Housekeeping
HUGE day tomorrow!
I’m doing GCX tomorrow for St. Jude! Twitch.tv/gcxevent 1-3:45 pm. Hosting on KFG.
I’m hosting EA Play at 4 pm PT, and the boys are live reacting. I have told them NOTHING.
Humble Bundle: Fight for Racial Justice: 
Games like Baba Is You, Spelunky, BioShock Remastered, but also…
GARY’S ANTHOLOGY!:https://www.humblebundle.com/fight-for-racial-justice-bundle?hmb_source=humble_home&hmb_medium=product_tile&hmb_campaign=mosaic_section_1_layout_index_1_layout_type_twos_tile_index_1_c_fightforjustice_bundle
The Roper Report   -
00:08:42 - POKEMON SNAP RETURNS, Kallie Plagge @ GameSpot
00:14:00 - I have to buy a new switch! - Best Friends Q:Dblock
00:34:00 - Female Lombax is playable in Ratchet and Clank: Rift Apart
00:40:00 - The KKK is Fucking Dead (in RED DEAD ONLINE), Patricia Hernandez @Polygon
00:43:00 - KFC Philippines Opens in Animal Crossing, Nicolo Manaloto @ Ungeek
00:46:20 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:55:52 - For a game that's both as anticipated, and is as narrative driven as TLOU2, do you expect a stronger than normal influx of spoilers and general douchiness surrounding the watching/streaming of the game?
01:06:00 - Squad Up:Mark Freeman(Zoom/Twiiter) - @theindieboy1
01:06:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg and Blessing
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
